com.mk4droid.IMC_Services
Class Download_Data

java.lang.Object
  com.mk4droid.IMC_Services.Download_Data

public class Download_Data
extends java.lang.Object

This class performs any download of data from remote server

Author:
Dimitrios Ververidis, Dr. Post-doctoral Researcher, Information Technologies Institute, ITI-CERTH, Thermi, Thessaloniki, Greece ververid@iti.gr, http://mklab.iti.gr

Download_Issues

public static java.lang.String Download_Issues(double x0down,
                                               double x0up,
                                               double y0down,
                                               double y0up,
                                               int IssueNolimit)
Download issues in a certain geographic rectangle

Parameters:
x0down - minimum longitude of the rectangle
x0up - maximum longitude of the rectangle
y0down - minimum latitude of the rectangle
y0up - maximum latitude of the rectangle
IssueNolimit - maximum number of issues to download within this rectangle starting from the most recent ones
Returns:

RestCaller

public static java.lang.String RestCaller(java.lang.String url,
                                          RestClient.RequestMethod rm,
                                          java.lang.String[] args,
                                          java.lang.String encoding)
Call REST (http with get or post) with specified parameters

Parameters:
url - the url to call
rm - RestClient.RequestMethod.GET or RestClient.RequestMethod.POST
args - Pairs of parameters to send with php {"Latitude","40.5","Longitude","23"}
encoding - "ANSI" or "UTF-8" to support multiple languages. HINT: utf-8 increases about x6 times the amount of transfered data
Returns:
